channel.title: Random idea for someone to create maybe;
channel.description:
is it possible to make a dueling option were you can run around and duel instead of just standing there..
also, i think someone you make range available in fighting mode.
i would try this but i have a fair bit more to learn, would rather learn then leech i guess.

item.title: Random idea for someone to create maybe;
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“puffer, post:18, topic:443019”][quote author=5 1 link=topic=545708.msg4001724#msg4001724 date=1338100370]

It’s not hard at all to make it work anywhere… Just restrict their movement into a 15x15 box, and they can’t step outside untill one of them is dead.

Doesn’t work like that big dawg. There will ALWAYS be a bug with this…

It shouldn’t happen and there is NO reason for it.
[/quote]

Not if you program it correctly.[/quote]
This…

Read full topic

-Nothing:

It’s not hard at all to make it work anywhere… Just restrict their movement into a 15x15 box, and they can’t step outside untill one of them is dead.

item.title: Random idea for someone to create maybe;
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:12, topic:443019"]It’s not hard at all to make it work anywhere… Just restrict their movement into a 15x15 box, and they can’t step outside untill one of them is dead.[/quote]I think that gets too complicated for some of the players. Does that include water? What if two people are having a DM in the same place? What if a bunch of people come and fuck it up?

Read full topic

item.title: Random idea for someone to create maybe;
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:10, topic:443019”][quote author=RSCShadow link=topic=545708.msg4000884#msg4000884 date=1337978387]
I think that was implemented in RSCAftermath. There were a lot of problems with having deathmatches anywhere though.
[/quote]
Only if it’s programmed poorly really.[/quote]Yeah in RSCA it was. But I think there were a few other problems as well that would take time to fix and implement. IMO it’s just a lot better having DM in an arena rather than just doing it anywhere. I imagine that’s why Jagex just had dueling without the ability to leave combat.

Read full topic
